short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your day with bible verses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feeling far from God? Finding it difficult to meditate on his words? Verse of the Day gives you a Bible verse daily that you can meditate upon as you go about your day, and help you stay in touch with the maker.

I hope this extension helps you as much as it as helped me in the past couple of days.
